/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is flanked on both sides by lush green trees and bushes, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. In the distance, a few buildings can be seen, their details softened by the perspective. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The overall effect is a tranquil and inviting snapshot of everyday life in Beijing.
